input.sentences: this guy played for the whole night at our favorite restaurant .
here is a close up of dom the musician !
my friend was allowed to join in | since it was his birthday !

output.sentences: My friend played a restaurant show at night.
As a musician, Dom was very close to perfect
He was joined by his tambourine playing friend, celebrating a birthday
He was happy to see his birthday buddy enjoying the show
They took a photo at the end of the night to remember the fun times had by all.
